<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Beast Speaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=1202) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Animal Trainer
](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=38)

**Prerequisites**
[Animal Trainer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1201)

</column>

---

You constantly have the effects of [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) as a 2nd-level innate primal spell. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to [Make a Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of animals while this spell is active.
